feed.title: jared tumiel
feed.subtitle: To live is to risk it all; otherwise you're just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you...

entry.title: In What Sense is Matter ‘Programmable’?
entry.summary: Just as every smartphone app was latent in the laws of computation as laid out nearly 100 years ago, what lies latent within the laws of physics, and how might we use this to increase our control over physical matter?
